title: A Day in New York 1920s in color [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
description:
I colorized, restored and created sound design for this video of 1920s New York, exploring the vibrant streets of New York. The jazz-filled air, iconic skyscrapers and infectious energy of an era that defined the spirit of the city that never sleeps.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

Thanks to EYE film museum to share the black & white video source

B&W Video Source: EYE film museum
